question: people sleep less than before in many countries. Why people sleep less? what effect does it have on an individually and on society
text: In a number of countries, sleeping hours of individual are reducing day-by-day. This is primarily due to modern lifestyle, hectic working hours and technology advancements. Due to these reasons, the whole society is affected in the wrong way. The main cause for  people sleep less is the adaptation of modern lifestyle, which forces them to take less sleep as they want entertainment in the form of late-night parties, talks and road trips. Further, due to an increase in working hours, individuals are not able to take naps soundings and effectively. Technological advancement is another issue because of which an individual‘s sleep has decreased. Due to the launch of mobile apps and social network sites, not only youngsters but aslo adults play games online, which do not allow them to sleep or take rest as they want to go to the next level of the game. Hence, these factors have an extremely harmful effect on an individual’s health as sleep gives rest to the body and brain and helps the body to increase and preserve energy and increase metabolism. So people who sleep less are always are, always tired owing to which their immunity is weak. The whole society is affected as people are becoming stressful and energetic and this reduces the economic productivity and social stability of a country. There are more incidents of divorce and family breakdown and people are not able to focus on work. To conclude, sleep of proper eight hours is a must for the human body‘s functioning, So, if people sleep well, there will be better, healthy and bright society
